name: Powerstage 200
details:
200-Watt Pedal Board Guitar Amp HeadSeymour Duncan's PowerStage 200 is a miniature power amplifier that is engineered to attain the best tone and performance from your pedal-based electric guitar rig. Small enough to fit right on your pedalboard, the PowerStage 200 still pumps out an astounding 200 watts — more than enough to power any combination of guitar cabinets. And the onboard 3-band EQ makes it extremely versatile, no matter what pedals you are using for your front end. Complete with built-in speaker cabinet emulation so you can record directly into your DAW, the Seymour Duncan PowerStage 200 is a powerful solution both on stage and in the studio.
Compact power amp for a pedal-based guitar rig
200 watts of power is enough for practically any type of performance
Small enough to fit in a backpack or right on your pedalboard
3-band EQ in the power section for dialing in your ideal tone
Built-in cabinet simulation allows you to go direct to your DAW or a mixing board
Headphone output for private practice sessions
Allows you to use your pedals as the rig's front end
